price: Kò sí ojúṣe kan fún Òjíṣẹ́ náà bí kò ṣe ìkéde (ẹ̀sìn). Allāhu sì mọ ohun tí ẹ̀ ń ṣàfi hàn rẹ̀ àti ohun tí ẹ̀ ń fi pamọ́.
arabic: مَّا عَلَى ٱلرَّسُولِ إِلَّا ٱلۡبَلَٰغُۗ وَٱللَّهُ يَعۡلَمُ مَا تُبۡدُونَ وَمَا تَكۡتُمُونَ

version.title: Yoruba translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Yoruba by Abu Rahima Mikhail Aikweiny, printed in 1432 H.

meta.transliteration: mā ʿalā al-rasūli illā al-balāghu wal-lahu yaʿlamu mā tub'dūna wamā taktumūna
